item.title: SaaS Explainer Video Creator for Tech Product - Upwork
item.description:
We are seeking a skilled video creator to produce a concise and engaging explainer video for our SaaS tech product. The video should be 1-2 minutes long, combining live-action presentations and some animation.

The video should highlight the problem we are trying to solve, features and benefits in a clear and engaging manner. The goal is to create a video that informs and captivates our target audience, effectively communicating our product's value.

Thanks!

Budget: $300
Posted On: June 21, 2024 06:50 UTC
Category: Video Production
Skills:Explainer Video, Video Editing, Video Production, 2D Animation, Graphic Design, Animation, Motion Graphics, Video Commercial, Adobe Illustrator
Skills: Explainer Video, Video Editing, Video Production, 2D Animation, Graphic Design, Animation, Motion Graphics, Video Commercial, Adobe Illustrator
Location Requirement: Only freelancers located in the United States may apply.
Country: United States
click to apply
